elements.text: When you *Strike* or *Clash* and burn momentum to improve your result, inflict +2 harm. If the fight continues, add +1 on your next move.
When you *Clash* and score a strong hit, add +1 if you immediately follow with a *Strike*.

When you *Swear an Iron Vow* by kneeling and grasping your swordâ€™s blade, add +1 and take +1 momentum on a hit. If you let the edge draw blood from your hands, *Endure Harm* (1 harm) in exchange for an additional +1 momentum on a hit.
